summary: This is a forwarded email chain from December 2018, containing a May 2016 email discussing an individual described as a 'scout' or recruiter of girls and/or women for Jeffrey Epstein. The email includes an attachment with the scout's contact information.

persons.name: Daniel Siad
persons.context: Described in a forwarded email as a 'scout' or recruiter of girls and/or women for Jeffrey Epstein. His contact information is attached to the email.

persons.name: Stan
persons.context: The sender of the May 2016 email who forwarded contact information for Daniel Siad, describing him as a recruiter for Epstein.

persons.name: J. Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as the individual for whom Daniel Siad is allegedly recruiting girls and/or women.

connections.description: Daniel Siad is described as a 'scout' or recruiter of girls and/or women for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Email about Epstein recruiter
events.description: An email is sent discussing Daniel Siad as a 'scout' or recruiter for Jeffrey Epstein, with his contact information attached.

events.title: Email forwarded
events.description: The May 2016 email about Daniel Siad is forwarded to another recipient.

keyFacts: Daniel Siad is identified in an email as a 'scout' or recruiter of girls and/or women for Jeffrey Epstein.
The email containing this allegation was originally sent in May 2016 and was forwarded in December 2018.
The email includes an attachment with Daniel Siad's contact information.
